entries.title: Greta Thunberg claps back at controversial influencer Andrew Tate
entries.description: Climate activist Greta Thunberg had a fiery response to controversial influencer Andrew Tate's attempt to boast about his carbon-dioxide-emitting cars.

entries.title: Their colleges banned TikTok over security fears. These students vow it won't stop them from scrolling.
entries.description: The University of Oklahoma and Auburn University in Alabama announced that they would ban access to TikTok from campus Wi-Fi. Some students call the ban unnecessary.
